title: Chopin: the eternal artist (S)
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
description: Episode of Series "Music maestro". Chopin's intimate understanding of the nature and limitations of the piano has never been surpassed. Even his slighter works still display that rich and passionate gift of melody without precedent in the history of music. This program explores the character of the man and builds a picture of his life and times. Using period images, a masterful narrative by conductor/composer David Palmer, and including performances by famed artists, this is an unforgettable record of the life and work of one of the world's greatest composers. Features the following works: 'Piano Concerto No. 1 & No. 2', Nocturnes, Waltzes, Preludes and Mazurkas, 'Barcarolle', 'Revolutionary study' and more...
